VMatrix/GetAngles.description: Returns the absolute rotation of the matrix.

VMatrix/GetField.description: Returns a specific field in the matrix.

VMatrix/GetForward.description: Gets the forward direction of the matrix.

VMatrix/GetInverse.description: Returns an inverted matrix without modifying the original matrix.

VMatrix/GetInverseTR.description: Returns an inverted matrix without modifying the original matrix. This function will not fail, but only works correctly on matrices that contain only translation and/or rotation.

VMatrix/GetRight.description: Gets the right direction of the matrix.

VMatrix/GetScale.description: Returns the absolute scale of the matrix.

VMatrix/GetTranslation.description: Returns the absolute translation of the matrix.

VMatrix/GetUp.description: Gets the up direction of the matrix.

VMatrix/Identity.description: Initializes the matrix as Identity matrix.

VMatrix/InvertTR.description: Inverts the matrix. This function will not fail, but only works correctly on matrices that contain only translation and/or rotation.

VMatrix/IsIdentity.description: Returns whether the matrix is equal to Identity matrix or not.

VMatrix/IsRotationMatrix.description: Returns whether the matrix is a rotation matrix or not.

VMatrix/Rotate.description: Rotates the matrix by the given angle.

VMatrix/Scale.description: Scales the matrix by the given vector.

VMatrix/ScaleTranslation.description: Scales the absolute translation with the given value.

VMatrix/Set.description: Copies values from the given matrix object.

VMatrix/SetAngles.description: Sets the absolute rotation of the matrix.

VMatrix/SetField.description: Sets a specific field in the matrix.

VMatrix/SetForward.description: Sets the forward direction of the matrix.

VMatrix/SetRight.description: Sets the right direction of the matrix.

VMatrix/SetScale.description: Modifies the scale of the matrix while preserving the rotation and translation.

VMatrix/SetTranslation.description: Sets the absolute translation of the matrix.

VMatrix/SetUp.description: Sets the up direction of the matrix.

VMatrix/ToTable.description: Converts the matrix to a 4x4 table. See

VMatrix/Translate.description: Translates the matrix by the given vector aka. adds the vector to the translation.
